Reviewer_2.Reviewer_2.1.1:
I would suggest to avoid citing supplementary figures at the beginning of the chapter.
 See for example chapter 2.4. Given that 2.4 chapter discusses data of supplementary figure 4 would suggest to make figure S4 as Figure 4 of the manuscript
Reviewer_2.Reviewer_2.1.2: To further clarify the infection methods a supplementary figure detailing graphically the modes of inoculation with figures would make the paper extremely useful for the community

Reviewer_2.Reviewer_2.1.4: Mycotoxin data analysis should be provided (I guess is policy of mdpi to make raw data available together with the publication)
